trans-unit.source: What does Azure Multi-Factor Authentication mean for me?
trans-unit.target: What does Azure Multi-Factor Authentication mean for me?

trans-unit.source: This is the Azure Multi-Factor authentication page that will assist your end users with getting going with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication.
trans-unit.target: This is the Azure Multi-Factor authentication page that will assist your end users with getting going with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication.

trans-unit.source: What does Azure Multi-Factor Authentication mean for me?
trans-unit.target: What does Azure Multi-Factor Authentication mean for me?

trans-unit.source: So, you have gotten an email from someone in IT or perhaps even your boss saying that they have added additional security verification to your account.
trans-unit.target: So, you have gotten an email from someone in IT or perhaps even your boss saying that they have added additional security verification to your account.

trans-unit.source: So what does this mean?
trans-unit.target: So what does this mean?

trans-unit.source: Not to worry.
trans-unit.target: Not to worry.

trans-unit.source: That simply means that your organization wants to take some extra steps to ensure that you are who you say you are when signing in to things such as Office 365.
trans-unit.target: That simply means that your organization wants to take some extra steps to ensure that you are who you say you are when signing in to things such as Office 365.

trans-unit.source: This is done by using a combination of your user name and password and a phone.
trans-unit.target: This is done by using a combination of your user name and password and a phone.

trans-unit.source: Either your office phone or a smart phone.
trans-unit.target: Either your office phone or a smart phone.

trans-unit.source: So the first thing you are going to need to do is complete the enrollment process.
trans-unit.target: So the first thing you are going to need to do is complete the enrollment process.

trans-unit.source: But before we start that process there are a few things to decide.
trans-unit.target: But before we start that process there are a few things to decide.

trans-unit.source: **Office phone or mobile phone** - Choose between using your office phone or your mobile phone.
trans-unit.target: **Office phone or mobile phone** - Choose between using your office phone or your mobile phone.

trans-unit.source: **Mobile phone call, text or mobile app** - If using a mobile phone, choose between receiving a call, a text, or using the mobile app.
trans-unit.target: **Mobile phone call, text or mobile app** - If using a mobile phone, choose between receiving a call, a text, or using the mobile app.

trans-unit.source: **Mobile app with a notification or verification code** - If using the mobile app, choose between receiving a notification that you respond to or a verification code.
trans-unit.target: **Mobile app with a notification or verification code** - If using the mobile app, choose between receiving a notification that you respond to or a verification code.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] Be aware that your IT department may disable one or more of the options above.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] Be aware that your IT department may disable one or more of the options above.

trans-unit.source: If this is the case, those options will not be available during the enrollment process.
trans-unit.target: If this is the case, those options will not be available during the enrollment process.

trans-unit.source: Now that you have decided on your verification method, it's time to enroll.
trans-unit.target: Now that you have decided on your verification method, it's time to enroll.

trans-unit.source: Use the [Setup Experience](multi-factor-authentication-end-user-first-time.md) link to get started with a walk through on the enrollment process.
trans-unit.target: Use the [Setup Experience](multi-factor-authentication-end-user-first-time.md) link to get started with a walk through on the enrollment process.

trans-unit.source: How to get going with multi-factor authentication
trans-unit.target: How to get going with multi-factor authentication

trans-unit.source: Select one of the topics below to get started.
trans-unit.target: Select one of the topics below to get started.

trans-unit.source: Topic
trans-unit.target: Topic

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Setup Experience
trans-unit.target: Setup Experience

trans-unit.source: Describes the process of setting up multi-factor authentication for the first time.
trans-unit.target: Describes the process of setting up multi-factor authentication for the first time.

trans-unit.source: Sign-in experience
trans-unit.target: Sign-in experience

trans-unit.source: Shows what you can expect from signing in using the various methods such as phone or app.
trans-unit.target: Shows what you can expect from signing in using the various methods such as phone or app.

trans-unit.source: Changing your settings
trans-unit.target: Changing your settings

trans-unit.source: Shows you how you can change your settings such as phone number or preferred enrollment method.
trans-unit.target: Shows you how you can change your settings such as phone number or preferred enrollment method.

trans-unit.source: Help with app passwords
trans-unit.target: Help with app passwords

trans-unit.source: Find information on creating and using app passwords.
trans-unit.target: Find information on creating and using app passwords.

trans-unit.source: Use the mobile app
trans-unit.target: Use the mobile app

trans-unit.source: The Azure Authenticator app is available for [Windows Phone](http://www.windowsphone.com/en-us/store/app/azure-authenticator/03a5b2bf-6066-418f-b569-e8aecbc06e50), [Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.azure.authenticator), and [IOS](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/azure-authenticator/id983156458).
trans-unit.target: The Azure Authenticator app is available for [Windows Phone](http://www.windowsphone.com/en-us/store/app/azure-authenticator/03a5b2bf-6066-418f-b569-e8aecbc06e50), [Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.azure.authenticator), and [IOS](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/azure-authenticator/id983156458).
